name: NOTTOLOT
description:
NOTTOLOT is a robot hacking action game.
Use the main character's ability to hack enemy robots to escape from the factory!

　

■Exhilarating hacking action
Control enemy robots with the main character's ability to hack them.
Sneak up from behind...tackle and hack!



■Enemy robots with various functions
Fly in the sky, climb walls, and more,
Manipulate enemies to break through gimmicks and clear all three stages!



■Tense factory escape
The main character "Rolly" longs for the outside world.
Can he escape from the robot production factory guarded by enemy robots?
